## Description

A clear description of what the bug is.

## Steps to reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. See error

## Expected behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior

What actually happened (include error messages, screenshots if relevant).

## Environment

- **Component:** WebApp / Backend / Bot / Crypto
- **OS:** e.g. macOS 14, Ubuntu 22.04
- **Browser (if WebApp):** e.g. Chrome 120, Telegram Desktop
- **Node / Python version:** e.g. Node 20, Python 3.11

## Additional context

Any other context, logs, or information that might help.
